title: Should we add type hints to the core module?

posts.name: Alice Smith
posts.cooked: I think we should add type hints to the core module. It would help with IDE support.

posts.name: Bob Jones
posts.cooked: I agree! Type hints make the code much easier to understand.

posts.name: Alice Smith
posts.cooked: Should we use strict mode or allow Any types?

posts.name: Bob Jones
posts.cooked: Strict mode is better. It catches more bugs at development time.

posts.name: Alice Smith
posts.cooked: Sounds good. I will start with the utils module first.
